definition[0]: the distance from the centre to the edge of a circle, or a line drawn from the centre to the edge
definition[1]: an area that covers a particular distance in all directions from a central point
example[0]: The shock of the explosion was felt over a radius of forty miles.
example[1]: There are more than a dozen golf courses within a 15-mile radius of St Andrews.
definition[2]: the outer bone of the lower part of your arm
